title: 连游戏界面都没看到就闪退了
author: ※笔尖※
txt_content:
本帖最后由 FHC红石 于 2019-8-14 15:31 编辑 

不管是单人还是多人，都是这样，进服务器也是这样
在游戏界面出现的一瞬间闪退
java重装过了，显卡也最新了，百度上的都试过了
昨天弄了一天没弄好，昨晚发帖子也没解决[08:51:02] [Client thread/INFO]: Setting user: Manmo
[08:51:04] [Client thread/INFO]: LWJGL Version: 2.9.4
#
# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
#  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000005df758e2, pid=7820, tid=0x0000000000001540
#
# JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (8.0_192-b12) (build 1.8.0_192-b12)
# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (25.192-b12 mixed mode windows-amd64 compressed oops)
# Problematic frame:
# C  [ig4icd64.dll+0x6d58e2]
#
# Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by default on client versions of Windows
#
# An error report file with more information is saved as:
# E:\服务器\Minecraft 【烈焰奇迹】v1.0\.minecraft\hs_err_pid7820.log
#
# If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:
#   http://bugreport.java.com/bugreport/crash.jsp
# The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code.
# See problematic frame for where to report the bug.
#

[error occurred during error reporting , id 0xc0000005]

replies.author: xianren66
replies.txt_content: 网易方面的问题请前往网易我的世界论坛

replies.txt_content:
小斌CHINA 发表于 2019-8-14 08:41
网易方面的问题请前往网易我的世界论坛
论坛早问了，没有，不只是网易，任何启动器都一样，直接闪退

replies.author: q22304423
replies.txt_content: 你清理一下内存  mod  有可能插件太多 导致 运行内存不够 打不开

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: 清晨w
replies.txt_content:
可以问一下你的显卡型号吗
出现问题的ig4icd64.dll是Intel图形加速器驱动程序的一部分
如果升级显卡驱动无效,请尝试回滚至旧版本
更改内存 内存过小 可能加载不过来 导致了蹦端！
